actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to increase from $300 to $600 the amount of burial and funeral expenses payable by the Veterans' Administration in the case of certain deceased veterans.

summary.text: Amends veterans' burial benefits to increase from $300 to $600 the amount the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs may pay to cover burial and funeral expenses for an eligible veteran.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to increase from $300 to $600 the amount of burial and funeral expenses payable by the Veterans' Administration in the case of certain deceased veterans.
